channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Tesla diner has already slashed its menu and restricted hours less than three weeks after its grand opening
The D.C. Takeover
item.description: We look at crime in the nation’s capital and President Trump’s legal authority to intervene.

item.description: The move is the first significant maneuver from Ken Martin to shape the party’s next presidential nominating process, but how much bite his proposal c...

item.title: Trump threatens legal action against Powell over Fed HQ, demands immediate rate cuts as inflation holds steady
item.description: Trump returned to his sharp critiques of the Fed chair, saying "Jerome 'Too Late' Powell must NOW lower the rate" after the inflation report came in a...

item.title: Trump Names EJ Antoni New BLS Commissioner

item.title: As Heat Wave Hits Southern Europe, Wildfires Kill 2

item.title: Sheila Jordan, Fearless Vocal Improviser, Is Dead at 96
item.description: She was revered in the jazz world as a chance taker who communicated an effervescent joy in the pure act of singing.

item.title: Bosses are making their staff return to the office or quit—but they’re notably absent themselves
item.description: Just 7% of CEOs say they go into the office full-time, despite a quarter believing a return to the office full-time is a priority.

item.title: Jerome Powell’s job just got a whole lot easier as inflation data sidesteps disaster
item.description: July inflation data suggests the FOMC's dual mandate may not be in as much of a pickle as economists previously feared.

item.title: Apple has a new AI problem—this time from Elon Musk, who’s threatening ‘legal action’ if it doesn’t knock ChatGPT off the top of its App Store
item.description: Musk is threatening 'legal action' if Apple doesn't knock ChatGPT off the top of its App Store.

item.title: Perpetrator in 1975 Iceland Bank Theft Comes Forward, 50 Years Later
item.description: Baskets of coins disappeared overnight from an Icelandic bank in 1975. Last month, someone finally owned up.

item.title: Trump Says He’s Going to Alaska to See What Putin ‘Has in Mind’
item.description: President Trump set a low bar for his summit with President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia, saying he was ready to walk away if no deal was forthcoming.
